definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: Development doesn't mean building high, buildings with tiny rooms.
sentences.chinese: 發展並不意味著高樓房小單位的建設。

sentences.english: At least, these implied seven wonderful things.
sentences.chinese: 這至少意味著七件奇妙的事情。

sentences.english: PEA does not mean mechanical quiescence.
It means you are asking if they have any discount item or promotional items.
sentences.chinese: 這意味著你問他們是否有任何折扣或促銷品項。

sentences.english: Sannyas means entering into a new world, the world of the no-ego.
sentences.chinese: 門徒意味著進入一個新的世界，那個非自我的世界。

sentences.english: But, "fast food" doesn't have to mean "fat food".
sentences.chinese: 但是，快餐食物並不意味著就是脂肪食物。

sentences.english: Joining the euro meant that countries could carry on with old habits for longer.
sentences.chinese: 加入歐元意味著這些國家可以繼續固守舊習。

sentences.english: To be concise, this means that he stands up from his tax post and follows Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 簡而言之，這意味著離開他的稅關，去跟隨耶穌。

sentences.english: This weans we have to wait another week or so.
sentences.chinese: 這就意味著我們還得等一個星期左右。

sentences.english: This means you have to utilize different muscle fibers which stimulate greater growth.
sentences.chinese: 這意味著你必須使用不同的肌纖維的刺激更大的發展。

sentences.english: Caviar has been considered a delicacy meant to be served with hors d' oeuvres .
sentences.chinese: 魚子醬已經被認爲是一個微妙意味著餐前須送達小食。

sentences.english: This meant creating a tunnel more than one-and-one half kilometers long.
sentences.chinese: 這意味著必修挖掘一條超過500米長的穿山隧道。

sentences.english: If it happens at Arsenal it would not mean I'd quit the club.
sentences.chinese: 如果阿仙奴被收購，並不意味著我會離開。

sentences.english: The Spain defeat now means that this afternoon is sudden death.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的翻盤意味著這個下午事關生死。

sentences.english: Dream means opportunity, means struggle of hope.
sentences.chinese: 夢意味著機會，意味著奮鬥的希望。

definition: let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
to arise/to come into being/to come about/to give rise to/to bring into being/to bring about/to produce/to engender/to generate/to appear/appearance/emergence/generation/production/yield
as for/as to/to go so far as to
